name: Sea Gazer
desc: A Liyue Adeptus who loved collecting treasure. He was the previous owner of the "Fantastic Compass."

imgDesc.text: Sea Gazer statue at the Lantern Rite.

customize.name: Adepti
customize.desc: Adepti are a group of immortal illuminated beasts of Liyue, who have protected people for millennia.

customize.text: A group of illuminated beasts, which Sea Gazer belongs to.

Sea Gazer was one of the most ancient Adeptus of Liyue. Together with Rex Lapis and the rest of Adepti they founded Liyue 3700 years ago. In the old days, Sea Gazer was close with Mountain Shaper. He was an old good friend of Cloud Retainer and Guizhong and their rival. The open-minded Adeptus passed away a long time ago. The third Lantern Rite, which Traveler and Paimon attended, was dedicated to him.
Sea Gazer adored collecting treasures; he kept them in the abode near the Lisha area. Occasionally he brought them to the Adepti assemblies. According to Cloud Retainer, usually he was calm, but when it came to demonstrating his treasures, he quite often started bragging. As soon as he showed his treasure, it immediately became the center of everyone’s attention, which outraged Cloud Retainer. Often Sea Gazer quarreled with her, because Adeptus’s treasures weren’t the results of his work but were found during his exploration,n where he dug them out of the ground, while Cloud Retainer’s innovations and mechanisms were made by herself.
Sea Gazer used to be the owner of the Fantastic Compass — an artifact that symbolized the unity of an Adeptus and a mortal, and the legendary Sunset Vermillionite; the Fantastic Compass was made to protect the people. Sea Gazer gifted the artifact to the mortal as a token of friendship, and lately it was used during the Cataclysm when the Milleliths were fighting against the Abyssal creatures in the Chasm. Vermillionite allowed any creation to soar in the sky. This material was used for the Jade Chamber construction and its reconstruction after the battle with Osial, Overlord of the Vortex, when he tried to attack the harbor. Same kind of stone is used for the Mingxiao Lantern — the biggest lantern built during Lantern Rite, which is constructed using the funds and donations from the annual Xiao Market.

customize.name: Lantern Rite
customize.desc: Every year on the day of the first full moon, Liyue celebrates the Lantern Rite. At night, the people launch many Xiao Lanterns and one large Mingxiao Lantern into the sky. Inside each lantern is a piece of plaustrite and the heart's desires written on special sticks. The lanterns slowly float away, illuminating the way for the souls of Liyue's faithful defenders.

customize.name: Adepti
customize.desc: Adepti are a group of immortal illuminated beasts of Liyue, who have protected people for millennia.

customize.name: Guizhong
customize.desc: The God of Dust, also known as Haagentus. She died in the Archon War.

customize.desc: An Adeptus living in Mt. Hulao, Liyue.

customize.name: Ningguang

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: The Eleventh of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as Childe. His real name is Ajax.

customize.name: Osial
customize.desc: Overlord of the Vortex, who was defeated by Rex Lapis during the Archon War.

customize.name: Vermillionite
customize.desc: A piece of plaustrite plucked from a Ruin Hunter. It has a rather unique color and is, perchance, the Vermillionite that Wang'ya mentioned...

customize.text: Perilous Trail Event Cutscene Animation: "Moment of Life or Death"

<color=#ffd780>June 5, 2022</color>
Many years ago, the adeptus Sea Gazer made good friends with a thaumaturge. Emulating the story of adepti and mortal kindred spirits recorded in ancient texts, he gave the mortal his treasured device to aid his friend in battle.
He said: "Look, my friend. This contraption is rather intriguing. If you and I activate it, one can move the heavens and shake the earth.
Such is how the world works. What one may fail to do, two may succeed.
I have spent much time gazing at the sea in leisure and have seldom exerted myself, but it is my pleasure to aid others in need.
The battle ahead is fraught with peril. Millennia later, both you and I may linger in this world no more. When the time comes, someone can return this device to the mountains, which will serve as testament to our friendship."
Thus did the catalyst find its way into mortal homes and stayed in their hands until...
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 21, 2023</color>
A new year brings with it new opportunities, dear friends, and good fortune.
On this night filled with a vibrant spectrum of lights, there's more than just lanterns in Liyue Harbor. Listen, for a brilliant resonance of celestial melodies rings in the air.
